name: Big Pharma
overview: Welcome to the world of Big Pharma! What if you had it in your power to rid the world of disease, to improve the lives of millions, to ease suffering and cure the sick and earn a tidy profit? As the head of your own Pharmaceutical Conglomerate you have this power resting in your hands. Will you use it for good? Being totally altruistic may not be the best business plan. The uncomfortable truth (is there an ointment for that?) is that some remedies are more profitable than others and illness is good for business. Features: • 35 business-busting challenges spread out across 7 unique scenarios • Custom game mode • Freebuild mode • Tons of new ingredients and recipes to discover • Hi-tech machines to help you refine the next generation of world-changing drugs • Wide range of business models to fit your Pharmaceutical Conglomerate
